title: Client Crashes At End of Game, Unable To Honor, Or Report People
body: As the title above states, there have been times where the client just out right crashes at the end of the game, preventing me from honoring, or even reporting people on my or the enemy team, who have either purposefully fed the enemy team, or us, or people who have just left in the middle of the game. This also has made me wonder if because of the client crashing just at the end of the game, does this mean that the points that I would have gained from that match be lost? I have had this problem happen to be quite a few times, and it's starting to get quite frustrating.

replies.body: You'll still get the LP after those matches even if the client crashes. I'd first try running a quick repair through the client options, and if you have "close client during game" try turning that *off* and test it in a custom game.
